Body: Description: We are closing a datacenter and need to migrate to another. The vmware infrastructure we are using will not be available in the new datacenter. Does endpointprotector support Nutanix? Another option we have is to move it to Azure. Is there a specific template we need to use for Azure? Can this run on a Windows server? If we deploy a new server, is the config migration as simple as creating a backup and then restoring that backup on the new server? Can we restore a linux config backup on a windows server?

What We've Learned Updated: 3/20/2025

- Customer has requested for an Azure EPP server image
- Verified EPP version is 5.9.4.1
- Azure ID is schemj@cpchem.com
Next Steps Updated: Working with team to submit an ADO requesting that Devops team create an Azure Image to provide/share with customer

- Sent customer email with steps to produce Blob SAS URL and send it to Netwrix
- Customer is currently reviewing these steps and mentioned that they are overly complicated
